sentences.en: An eighteenth - century satirist reviewed the troublesome period.
sentences.cn: 一位18世纪的讽刺作家对这一动乱时期作了评论.

sentences.en: I took the elevator to the eighteenth floor.
sentences.cn: 我坐电梯上了第十八层。

sentences.en: I will meet you on the eighteenth next month.
sentences.cn: 我下月十八号和你见面.

sentences.en: In the mid-eighteenth century the production of food far outstripped the rise in population.
sentences.cn: 18世纪中叶食物的产量远远超过人口的增长。

sentences.en: Indeed, arguably a modern military power, at least in the seventeenth and early eighteenth-century sense, and he injects European culture into Russia.
sentences.cn: 至少在十七世纪和十八世纪早期,它可以算是一个现代化的军事大国,同时 他将欧洲文化注入俄国

sentences.en: My rooms were large, with deeply recessed windows and painted, eighteenth - century panellin.
sentences.cn: 我住的房间很宽敞, 有向里凹陷很深的窗户,油漆过的十八世纪的镶花地板.

sentences.en: Such disputes multiplied in the eighteenth and nineteenth centuries.
sentences.cn: 这类纠纷在18和19世纪大量增多。

sentences.en: the architecture of the eighteenth century
The eighteenth century saw the devolopment of modern pathology and experimental surgery.
sentences.cn: 18世纪是近代病理学和实验外科学发展的开端.

sentences.en: The eighteenth century sought to refine upon Shakespeare by altering and adapting his plays.
sentences.cn: 18世纪,人们试图通过改编莎士比亚的作品来超过他.

sentences.en: The first accurate census, I think, is in Copenhagen at the end of the eighteenth century.
sentences.cn: 我认为,第一次精确的人口普查,是在十八世纪末的哥本哈根

sentences.en: The litigation aroused enormous interest in Scotland in the eighteenth century.
sentences.cn: 18世纪在苏格兰该诉讼案影响很大.

sentences.en: The potential equation had figured in the eighteenth - century work on gravitation.
sentences.cn: 位势方程在十八世纪关于引力的研究中已显露头角.

sentences.en: The seventeenth to Hezir, the eighteenth to Aphses.
sentences.cn: 第十七是希悉，第十八是哈辟悉。

sentences.en: The siege is now in its eighteenth day.
sentences.cn: 围困今天已经进入第18天了。

sentences.en: Their lives interconnect with those of celebrated figures of the late eighteenth-century.
sentences.cn: 他们的生活与18世纪晚期的名人联系在一起。

sentences.en: This a facsimile edition of an eighteenth century book.
sentences.cn: 这是一本18世纪书籍的复制版.

sentences.en: This is a facsimile edition of an eighteenth century book.
sentences.cn: 这是一本18世纪书籍的复制版。

sentences.en: We got engaged on my eighteenth birthday.
sentences.cn: 在我18岁生日那天我们订婚了。

trans.tran_cn: 第十八的，第十八个的，十八分之一的
第十八，十八分之一，（每月的）第十八日
第十八，十八号，十八分之一的
